com.facebook.litho.widget

Interface RecyclerBinderAdapterDelegate<T extends RecyclerBinderViewHolder>


  • public interface RecyclerBinderAdapterDelegate<T extends RecyclerBinderViewHolder>
    A delegation that is used to customize the adapter behaviour for the RecyclerView that the RecyclerBinder uses.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getItemId(int position)
      The same function as androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter#getItemId(int).
      boolean hasStableIds()
      The same function as androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter#hasStableIds().
      void onBindViewHolder(T viewHolder, int position, ComponentTree componentTree, RenderInfo renderInfo)
      The same function as androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter#onBindViewHolder(androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder, int) but with two additional parameters, and , which are useful to the LithoView.
      T onCreateViewHolder(ViewGroup parent, int viewType)
      The same function as androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter#onCreateViewHolder(ViewGroup, int).
      void onViewRecycled(T viewHolder)
      The same function as androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter#onViewRecycled(androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder).

    • Method Detail

      • onCreateViewHolder

        T onCreateViewHolder(ViewGroup parent,
                     int viewType)
        The same function as androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter#onCreateViewHolder(ViewGroup, int).

      • onBindViewHolder

        void onBindViewHolder(T viewHolder,
                      int position,
                      ComponentTree componentTree,
                      RenderInfo renderInfo)
        The same function as androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter#onBindViewHolder(androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder, int) but with two additional parameters, and , which are useful to the LithoView. It will be called after the LithoView has been attached to the screen.

      • onViewRecycled

        void onViewRecycled(T viewHolder)
        The same function as androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter#onViewRecycled(androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder).

      • hasStableIds

        boolean hasStableIds()
        The same function as androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter#hasStableIds().

      • getItemId

        long getItemId(int position)
        The same function as androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter#getItemId(int).
